title: The Google Assistant is getting a big reboot around generative AI
description: "Supercharging" the Assistant means some layoffs and a lot of leadership changes.

title: Steering failures are Tesla’s new federal safety worry
description: Steering failure is the latest in a string of safety investigations into Tesla EVs.

title: Meta plans AI-powered chatbots to boost social media numbers
description: Amid competition from TikTok, Meta looks to the next frontier of user engagement.

title: X sues hate speech researchers whose “scare campaign” spooked Twitter advertisers
description: Lawsuit comes as Musk and Yaccarino seize control of X's trust and safety team.

title: It’s a hot 0-day summer for Apple, Google, and Microsoft security fixes
description: July saw two high-severity bugs in Firefox, while Oracle patched over 500 vulnerabilities.

title: Biden administration reverses Trump decision to relocate US Space Command
description: The Air Force recommended during Trump's final days in office basing Space Command in Alabama.

title: Reddit beats film industry, won’t have to identify users who admitted torrenting
description: Court quashes subpoena for names of users who talked torrenting in 2011 thread.

title: Microsoft keeps pushing toward repairability, now with Xbox controller parts
description: Let the Xbox team take you inside your worn (or tossed) Xbox controller.

title: That time an Air Force sergeant spotted pulsars months before astronomers
description: Jocelyn Bell-Burnell: "He happened to be a very observant person."

title: Connected car data privacy under investigation by California regulator
description: A 2018 law gives Californians the right to know what data businesses are collecting.

title: Multiple Chinese APTs establish major beachheads inside US infrastructure
description: Three major campaigns from 3 different Chinese groups are keeping US defenders busy.
